it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.rmi

Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.rmi.RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, NetworkHandler, RemoteInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIClient
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientInterface, RemoteInterface
    The RMI implementation of ClientInterface
    Author:
    Francesco Masciulli
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIClient

        public RMIClient(java.lang.String user,
                 int port,
                 java.lang.String serverIPAddress)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 java.net.ConnectException
        Create a UnicastRemoteObject with the given port, set username, server and client IpAddress and port; try to reach the server
        Parameters:
        user - is client username
        port - is the client port
        serverIPAddress - is the server IP address
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - because extend UnicastRemoteObject
        java.net.ConnectException - if couldn't reach the server

      • remoteSendBroadcast

        public void remoteSendBroadcast(Event message)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Specified by:
        remoteSendBroadcast in interface RemoteInterface
        Parameters:
        message - could be a client broadcast message
